General.Name: Tianyang Hot Mel
General.Description: Tianyang New Materials (Shanghai) Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of thermoplastic and reactive adhesive materials in China and internationally. It offers thermoplastic Copolyamide and coployster granules and powders; modified polyamide hot melt adhesive materials; web, film, and PUR adhesives; solar encapsulation films; and electronic adhesives. Its products are used in clothing and textile, automobile, electronics, reflective materials, shoe materials and construction materials. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Tianyang Hot Melt Adhesives Co., Ltd. Tianyang New Materials (Shanghai) Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.
